channel.title: Ioit on The poetry of (in)security
channel.description: Recent content in Ioit on The poetry of (in)security

item.title: Exploiting the Eques Elf Smart Plug Part Two
item.description: In part one, we concentrated on analysing the network communication when one turns the smart power plug on or off from the app. We had noticed some form of encrypted/encoded communication happening on udp port 27431 between the smart plug and the app installed on the phone. We also noticed some form of encrypted/encoded communication on tcp ports 9123 and 5222(xmpp) between the app, smart plug and ikonkek2.com.
